illandril-npc-quick-actions.setting.mini: The Quick Actions menu will show when right-clicking on tokens owned by the user if they have the selected Role or greater. Note: GMs "own" every token.
illandril-npc-quick-actions.setting.show: If checked, spells that have the "Prepared" Spell Preparation Mode that are not marked as "Prepared" will be shown in the Quick Actions menu for "Player Character" type actors without a player owner. (Note: these spells will appear in the Quck Actions menu for "Non-Player Character" type actors regardless of if they have a player owner or not and regardless of this setting.)
If checked, spells that have the "Prepared" Spell Preparation Mode that are not marked as "Prepared" will be shown in the Quick Actions menu for "Player Character" type actors with a player owner.

If checked, items that are not not marked as "Equipped" will be shown in the Quick Actions menu for "Player Character" type actors without a player owner. (Note: these items will appear in the Quck Actions menu for "Non-Player Character" type actors regardless of if they have a player owner or not and regardless of this setting.)
If checked, items that are not not marked as "Equipped" will be shown in the Quick Actions menu for "Player Character" type actors with a player owner.
Show Actions with Zero Uses Left
If checked, actions that have zero uses remaining will be shown in the Quick Actions menu.
